data.benefits: Scheme provides One-time Support reimbursement of 25% of expenditure incurred towards registration on NSE's/BSE's SME exchange platform and raising of funds.
data.eligibility: All small and medium units want to listed on stock exchange are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
The unit must have filed Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM) on the portal for statistical purposes.
The unit should not be in the restrictive list as notified by the State government.
The unit must have no objection certificate (if applicable).
The unit should be in commercial production.
The unit must be in regular production at the time of disbursement.
data.beneficiaries: All small and medium units want to listed on stock exchange are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
The unit must have filed Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM) on the portal for statistical purposes.
The unit should not be in the restrictive list as notified by the State government.
The unit must have no objection certificate (if applicable).
The unit should be in commercial production.
The unit must be in regular production at the time of disbursement.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.context: The purpose of this scheme is to encourage SMEs to raise capital through this medium by providing financial assistance.
data.objective: To assist Small and Medium Enterprises in raising capital through the SME in terms of reimbursement
data.description: Scheme provides One-time Support reimbursement of 25% of expenditure incurred towards registration on NSE's/BSE's SME exchange platform and raising of funds.
data.how_to_apply: All the eligible SMEs are required to submit the application form along with listed supporting documents for obtaining financial assistance towards the expenses incurred on registration with NSE/BSE, to the Director/ Director General, Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises, on the website of the department.
data.funding_facilitator: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefits after  the approval from the concerned authority.
data.additional_info:
Link of list of Restrictive Industries in Haryana: https://www.hsiidc.org.in/uploads/estate_managements/170097742718HEEP%20restrictive%20list.pdf
Categorization of Blocks : https://investharyana.in/content/pdfs/Re-categorization%20of%20blocks%2015.11.2018.pdf
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate (URC)
Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM)
NOC/CLU (No Objection Certificate/Change of Land Use)
Haryana Resident Certificate (for local employment benefits)
ESI/PF Registration Number
Proof of Commercial Production
Financial Statements (Balance Sheet, Profit & Loss Statement)
Import-Exporter Code (IEC)
Registration-cum-Membership Certificate (RCMC) from Export Promotion Council
Land Documents (ownership or lease agreement)
Environmental Clearances (if applicable)
Zero Defect Zero Effect (ZED) Certification
Proof of Investment (in machinery/equipment)
Electricity Bills (for electricity-related incentives)
Energy Audit Report (for energy efficiency claims)
Other Miscellaneous Documents (as per specific schemes)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address :  Sh. Deepak Burak , Directorate of MSME
Phone No: 8699888828
Email-id deepakbura.etd@hry.gov.in
data.beneficiary: All Industry - All Entities - Haryana - Small and Medium
